body:
My Introduction ( ManOfNoodle )
Hello Guys I'm ManOfNoodle And I'm New At Avicus Network 
I <3 The Server So Much Meet A Player And Yea I Joined About 10 Min Ago And The Owner Is Kind, Awesome, Cool And Yea I Can't Wait To Meet You Guys

Thanks For Taking Your Times To Read Guys :D

Kind Regards
~ManOfNoodle
